name: 1UP
description_a: Choose a player. That player gains 1 life. You cannot go above your max life.
description_b: Play this when any player is reduced to 0 life. That player returns to 1 life.

name: BOMB
description_a: Activate your Spell Card. You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
description_b:
Play this when another player plays a Danmaku card or activates their Spell Card.

Cancel that card.

name: "BORROW"
description_a:
Choose any Item in play.

You gain control of that Item.

name: CAPTURE SPELL CARD
description_a:
Choose another player and activate their character's Spell Card as if it were your own. You may choose a defeated player's character.

You can only activate one Spell Card per ro

name: FOCUS
description_a:
You have +2 Distance.

You an only activate one Defense card in play at a time.

name: GRAZE
description_a:
Play this when you are attacked.

You avoid the attack.

You may discard a Danmaku card to play this on behalf of another player.

name: GRIMOIRE
description_a: Draw two cards.

title: Antique Shop
name: KOURINDOU
description_a: As you play this card, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw cards equal to the number of cards discarded this way plus one.

name: LASER SHOT
description_a:
Attack a player, regardless of range. This attack cannot be avoided.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: LAST WORD
description_a:
Attack all other players, regardless of range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: MASTER PLAN
description_a:
Resolve the current incident.

Then, look at the top three cards of any deck and place them on the top or bottom of that deck in any order.

name: MELEE
description_a:
Attack a player, regardless of range.

This does not count against your Danmaku card limit.

That player may then discard a Danmaku card to copy this effect.

name: MINI-HAKKERO
description_a:
You have +3 range.

You may discard two cards to activate your Spell Card.

You can only activate one Spell Card per round. You can only have one Artifact card in play at a time.

name: PARTY
description_a:
Look at cards from the top of the deck equal to the number of active players.

Then, for each active player, choose one of those cards and place it in their hand.

Then draw a card.

name: SEAL AWAY
description_a:
Choose a player. You may force that player to discard an Item card of your choice that player controls.

Then, attack that player if they are in range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: SHOOT
description_a:
Attack a player in range.

You may discard Danmaku cards to give this attack +1 Range for each card discarded.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.

name: SORCERER'S SUTRA SCROLL
description_a:
When you play this card, draw a card.

Draw an extra card during your draw step. Your max hand size is 7.

You can only have one Artifact card in play at a time.

name: SPIRITUAL ATTACK
description_a:
Activate your Spell Card.

You can only activate one Spell Card per round.

name: STOPWATCH
description_a:
You have +1 Distance.

You can play two additional Danmaku cards each round.

You can only have one Artifact card in play at a time.

name: SUPERNATURAL BORDER
description_a:
When you are attacked, flip the top card of the deck. If it is a Spring or Summer card, you avoid that attack.

You can only have one Defense card in play at a time. Discard one Powerup card whenever you lose life to an attack.

name: TEMPEST
description_a: All players discard their hand and draw three cards.

title: The Magic Library
name: VOILE
description_a: Draw three cards, then place a card from your hand on top of the deck.

name: ERASE SHOT
description_a:
Attack a player in range.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.
description_b:
Play this when you are attacked.

You avoid the attack.

name: EXTRA STAGE
description_a:
Each player draws one card from the Lunatic deck.

Draw a card.

name: NIBLE CLOTH
description_a:
You have +1 Distance.

Once per turn, you may discard a card from your hand to avoid an attack.

You can only have one Defense card in play at a time.

name: OCCULT BALL
description_a: Draw a card from the Lunatic deck.

name: PURIFICATION
description_a:
Attack a player in range. This cannot be canceled.

By default you can only play one Danmaku card per round.
description_b: Choose a player. You may force that player to discard an Item card of your choice that player controls.

name: REVENGE SHOT
description_a:
Play this card when you are attacked.

Attack the attacker, regardless of range.

This does not count against your Danmaku card limit.

name: SPELL ASSIST
description_a:
Activate your Spell Card.

You can only activate one Spell Card per round.
description_b: Reveal this card, then put it in another player's hand. You may play this at any time.
